'''0.1.2_01''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released for client version [[Alpha v1.0.16_01|v1.0.16_01]] on August 12, 2010.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a flaw in the authentication scheme.<ref>https://notch.tumblr.com/post/943303185/security-server-update-01201</ref>
** The login key is now turned into a proper nonce that gets changed every time a new TCP connection is made to the server.
